law.catch_line: It is the intent of the General Assembly:...
law.text:
It is the intent of the General Assembly:
That grants shall be awarded through the Program from July 1, 2008 through June 30, 2009, for fiscal year 2009; and
That full funding for grants shall continue in the subsequent two fiscal years unless the Office of Oral Health determines that a grantee is not fulfilling the conditions of the award.
